parameter.name: autoscrollbar
parameter.help: The index of the default selected item, if none is provided via the selected="true" attribute on an item.

parameter.name: border_bottom
parameter.help: The size of the bottom border which defaults to bordersize.

parameter.name: border_left
parameter.help: The size of the left border which defaults to bordersize.

parameter.name: border_right
parameter.help: The size of the right border which defaults to bordersize.

parameter.name: border_top
parameter.help: The size of the top border which defaults to bordersize.

parameter.name: bordersize
parameter.help: The size in pixels for this list.

parameter.name: minheight
parameter.help: The size in pixels for this listminumum height of the list, default: 24.

parameter.name: shownitems
parameter.help: The number of items that are displayed. This value will ignored if this view attempts to draw past the canvas boundary.

parameter.name: spacing
parameter.help: The number of pixels that items should be spaced from one another.
